metadata.title: CVE-2016-6335 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1does not generate head items in the context of a given title, which allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a parse action toapi.php.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
